content:
本件保存
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
MC- 283 MEMORANDUM JUL 31 1962
TO : 'Mr. Stephen Tan, Third Division, CUSA FROM: H. T. Potter, Supply Advisor, US AID/C Q
Reference telephone conversation Tan Potter of p.m. 7/30/62, forwarded herewith are B/L Nos. 7 and 22. The Chevrolet 1959 Pick-up vehicles consigned on B/L 22 are for US AID/C, the Toyota Buses are for JORR. Our instructions to USAID/Korea was to consign the buses to CUSA. The buses have been cleared through customs and JCRR are in possession. Documents may be endorsed to show receipt and acceptance by CUSA.
許躍薾
Encl. As stated 40.112.213.82
德 2
51. 7. 31
15085 V.C.
8 G. 3
CUSA
みみん
國史饭 Academia Historica
34
